summary: This is an affidavit from an AT&T Legal Compliance Analyst and Custodian of Records verifying the authenticity of AT&T subscriber and call detail records. The affidavit states that copies of records were mailed to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021, and attests to their reliability as business records made in the regular course of AT&T's business in 2008.

persons.name: Christian R. Everdell
persons.context: Mailed copies of AT&T subscriber and call detail records to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021.

events.title: Mailing of AT&T records
events.description: Christian R. Everdell mailed copies of AT&T subscriber and call detail records to the National Compliance Center.

events.title: Affidavit sworn
events.description: The affidavit verifying the authenticity of AT&T records was sworn to and subscribed before a notary public.

locations: 11760 US HIGHWAY 1, SUITE 600 NORTH PALM BEACH, FL 33408-3029
keyFacts: An AT&T Custodian of Records verified the authenticity of AT&T subscriber and call detail records.
The records were originally created in 2008 and were maintained as part of AT&T's regular business practices.
Copies of the records were mailed to the National Compliance Center on October 14, 2021.
The affidavit was sworn on October 20, 2021, in Palm Beach County, Florida.
